pr_title: fix: do not overwrite schemas from a CREATE STREAM/TABLE

timeline.message: fix: do not overwrite schemas from a CREATE STREAM/TABLE

timeline.bodyText: Just to make sure, in which case to we want to overwrite existing schemas?
timeline.author: vpapavas
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -96,7 +99,8 @@ private void registerForCreateAs(final ConfiguredStatement<? extends CreateAsSel
         queryMetadata.getResultTopic().getKafkaTopicName(),
         queryMetadata.getResultTopic().getValueFormat().getFormatInfo(),
         cas.getConfig(),
-        cas.getStatementText()
+        cas.getStatementText(),
+        true

replies.bodyText: we want to overwrite existing schemas in the case of CREATE * AS SELECT
replies.author: agavra
